name: api
description: The API that powers the Singularity platform. Built on FastAPI.

scripts.dev: make start-detached && docker exec -it singularity-api make app
scripts.install: make start-detached && docker exec -it singularity-api make deps
scripts.test: make start-detached && docker exec -it singularity-api make tests

author: Andrei Ujica <andrei.uji22@gmail.com>
